recipesJson.name: Blübat
recipesJson.author: BCrunk
recipesJson.description: Blueberry cupcake batter. Inspired by NotCharlesManson's Batter Up. By inspired, I mean I used RF Blueberry instead. Give it at least a week to age and let the blueberry really come out. Or vape it right away, idgaf. It just won't be as good.
